question: My mum did a thyroid function test and the results showed that her TSH levels were low, T4 was normal while her T3 was high. She is on thyroid suppliments, since her thyroid glands were removed.  She also has a liver condition where she it taking prednisone.  As a result of the predinisone she has type II diabetes.  I appreciate it if you could traslate to me the intepretation of the result and give me any solutions to improve her condition.  Thank you.
title: Low TSH, Normal T4 with High T3
